alert.note: Alert for Boone; Dallas; Greene; Guthrie; Madison; Polk; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Polk, southeastern Greene, northeastern Madison, northeastern Guthrie, southwestern Boone, Dallas and northwestern Warren Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 259 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms from south of Perry, to near Adel and Waukee, to West Des Moines, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail and additional rainfall up to one inch. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Ponding of water on roadways, low visibilities, and rises in small streams and creeks. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Jordan Creek Town Center around 310 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include West Des Moines, Valley West Mall, Clive, Waukee, Windsor Heights, Urbandale, Merle Hay Mall, Johnston, Grimes, Saylorville, Polk City, Granger, Saylorville Lake and Big Creek Lake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 62 and 72, and between mile markers 87 and 96. Interstate 80 between mile markers 107 and 146. Interstate 235 between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Boone; Dallas; Greene; Guthrie; Madison; Polk; Warren
